summary.span: 提供创建图形缓冲区的方法，该缓冲区可用于双缓冲。

span.span: Provides methods for creating graphics buffers that can be used for double buffering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类允许您为图形实现自定义双缓冲。The class allows you to implement custom double buffering for your graphics. 使用双缓冲的图形可以减少或消除因重绘显示图面而引起的闪烁。Graphics that use double buffering can reduce or eliminate flicker that is caused by redrawing a display surface. > [!NOTE] > 使用双缓冲的最简单方法是 使用方法在控件上设置控件样式标志 。The simplest way to use double buffering is to set the control style flag on a control using the method. 如果为 控件设置控件样式标志，则会通过默认图形缓冲区重定向控件的所有绘制，无需任何其他代码。Setting the control styles flag for a control redirects all painting for the control through a default graphics buffer, without requiring any additional code. 默认情况下，此标志设置为 `true` 。This flag is set to `true` by default. 类提供用于创建和配置图形缓冲区的方法。The class provides methods for creating and configuring a graphics buffer. 方法创建一个 ，它是图形缓冲区的包装，它还提供可用于写入缓冲区并将其内容呈现给输出设备的方法。The method creates a , which is a wrapper for a graphics buffer that also provides methods you can use to write to the buffer and render its contents to an output device. 可以 从静态属性中检索当前应用程序域的 。You can retrieve the for the current application domain from the static property. 对于具有动画效果的图形密集型应用程序，可以使用构造函数创建专用应用程序 ，但对于大多数应用程序，该 属性就足够了。For graphically intensive applications such as animation, you can create a dedicated using the constructor, but for most applications the property will be sufficient. 有关绘制缓冲图形和自定义缓冲实现的详细信息，请参阅 [双缓冲图形](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/double-buffered-graphics) 和 [如何：手动管理缓冲图形](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-manually-manage-buffered-graphics)。For more information on drawing buffered graphics and custom buffering implementations, see [Double Buffered Graphics](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/double-buffered-graphics) and [How to: Manually Manage Buffered Graphics](/dotnet/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-manually-manage-buffered-graphics). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取 当前应用程序域的。The following code example demonstrates how to acquire the for the current application domain. 此代码是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code is part of a larger example provided for the class.
